field_ids.formulaExpression: IF(branch_id.name=="Esco US",ROUND(salesPrice - salesPrice * discount,0) * quantity,IF(branch_id.name=="Esco Bangladesh",((salesPrice - (salesPrice * discount)) + ((salesPrice - (salesPrice * discount)) * vat)) * quantity,IF(branch_id.name=="Esco Vietnam",((salesPrice - (salesPrice * discount)) + ((salesPrice - (salesPrice * discount)) * vat)) * quantity,IF(branch_id.name=="Esco Aster",(salesPrice - salesPrice * (discount + commisionPercentDistributor)) * quantity,(salesPrice - salesPrice * discount) * quantity))))

fields.formulaExpression: IF(AND((branch_id._id=="5db153f7a6ebc7c02b0c8d02"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Service (GST 18%)")),amount*0.18,IF(amount==0,0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"MYR"),0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"MMK"),amount*0.05, IF(AND((branch_id._id=="5bfcf6c8678f71594d642a84"),ISPICKVAL(idr_vat_id,"VAT INC")),amount*0.05, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"VND"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Vat (10%)")),amount*0.1,IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"VND"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Vat (8%)")),amount*0.08,IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"VND"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Vat (5%)")),amount*0.05,IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"VND"),amount*0.1, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"USD-Myanmar"),amount*0.05, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"TWD"),ROUND(amount*0.05,1), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Spare Parts (5%)")),(amount-discount)*0.05, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Validation, Certification (15%)")),(amount-discount)*0.15, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Other general service (IQOQ) (10%)")),(amount-discount)*0.10, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"VAT% (7.5%)")),(amount-discount)*0.075, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),ISPICKVAL(bdt_vat_id,"Vat (0%)")),0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT"),0, IF((pricebook_id._id=="5c0723d8678f7161775a1e10"),amount*0.15, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT-SP"),amount*0.04, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"PHP"),amount*0.12, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"SGD"),(amount - (amount * discountPercentage))*0.08, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"THB"),amount*0.07, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"IDR"),(amount-discount)*0.11, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"EURO-w/VAT"),amount*0.2,0))))))))))))))))))))))))

fields.label: VAT

fields.formulaExpression: IF(amount==0, 0, IF((branch_id._id=="5db153f7a6ebc7c02b0c8d02"), vat + amount,IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"MMK"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"AUD"), amount + 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"CNY"), amount + 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"KRW"), amount + 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"XAF"), amount + 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"GBP"), amount + 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"JPY"), amount + 0, IF((branch_id._id=="5bfcf6c8678f71594d642a84"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"EURO - w/VAT"), vat + idrDelivery + (amount - discount), IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"TWD"), ROUND(vat + amount,0), IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"USD-Myanmar"), vat + amount, IF((branch_id._id=="5bfcf6c9678f71594d642a86"), vat + cad + transportCost + bgdLetterOfCredit + bgdCertCountryOrigin + idrDelivery + bgdTeleTransfer + (amount - discount), IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BDT-SP"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"PHP"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"VND"), vatAmountTotal + subTotalNoVat, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"SGD"), vat + (amount - (amount * discountPercentage)), IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"THB"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"EURO"), usShippingAndHandling + idrDelivery + (amount - discount) , IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"BD-USD"), cad + bgdCertCountryOrigin + bgdLetterOfCredit + bgdTeleTransfer + idrDelivery + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"HKD"), amount - discount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"MYR"), amount - discount, IF((pricebook_id._id=="5c0723d8678f7161775a1e10"), vat + amount, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"USD"), usSalesTax + usInsideDelivery + liftGateCharge + usShippingDock + amount, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"IDR"),ISPICKVAL(idr_vat_id,"VAT INC")), (amount - discount) + vat + idrDelivery, IF(ISPICKVAL(currency_picklist_id,"IDR"), (amount - discount) + idrDelivery ,amount + 0)))))))))))))))))))))))))))

leads-item.description:
Please send your best offer for the belowL:
1.	Dry Block Heater
2.	Freezing Unit For IVF Straws
3.	Cryo Sealer For Straws
4.	Electronic Pipette For IVF Lab
5.	Sperm Analyzer For IVF
6.	Laser System For IVF

Along with the offer please send the following documents
 
•	Filled Compliance Specs Sheets
•	Valid Authorization Letter
•	CE/FDA Certificates
•	Catalogue / Brochures
